attributes.action: ensure honours are no longer given away to celebrities over our true heroes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have soldiers fighting across the globe, some of whom will never return home alive. Yet whilst they fight we have footballers, popstars, television presenters, flavours of the month, recieving the finest honours this land can offer. Is that fair?

It's time this nonsense and injustice ceased, these people don't deserve the honours which should be set aside for real heroes who never seem to recieve the recognition they deserve in life or death. It's an insult and a disgrace that the honours system is being so devalued.
